title: How to Make a Jello Pie

steps.headline: Get a bowl and pour the jello gelatin.
Let all of the gelatin dissolved.
steps.description: it will help if you stir.

steps.headline: Put it in the freezer.
steps.description: take it out when it is done froze.

steps.headline: Break the gelatin with a spoon.
Add whipped cream on the crust (not so much).
Add gelatin on the whipped cream.
Put some more whipped cream (cover it all up).
Add the gelatin (put a little, like sprinkles).

text: Get a bowl and pour the jello gelatin.  Pour the hot water.  Let all of the gelatin dissolved. it will help if you stir. Pour the cold water.  Put it in the freezer. take it out when it is done froze. Break the gelatin with a spoon.  Add whipped cream on the crust (not so much).  Add gelatin on the whipped cream.  Put some more whipped cream (cover it all up).  Add the gelatin (put a little, like sprinkles).  Finished.
